mapper.sql: select id, name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, type, display, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_time, update_time from dinky_sys_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.path, m.component, m.display, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from dinky_sys_menu m where m.type in ('0', '1') order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.path, m.component, m.display, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from dinky_sys_menu m left join dinky_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join dinky_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join dinky_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.type in ('0', '1') AND ro.is_delete = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.id, m.parent_id from dinky_sys_menu m left join dinky_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.id not in (select m.parent_id from dinky_sys_menu m inner join dinky_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id and rm.role_id = #{roleId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from dinky_sys_menu m left join dinky_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join dinky_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from dinky_sys_menu m left join dinky_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join dinky_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join dinky_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where r.is_delete = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select count(1) from dinky_sys_menu where parent_id = #{menuId} limit 1

select a.* from dinky_sys_menu a
1=1
and a.name like "%${param.name}%"

and a.type = #{param.type}
and a.create_time >= str_to_date( #{param.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.update_time >= str_to_date( #{param.updateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and
